EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-12-2019 IT Predictions EMEA - Thank You.EMAIL-Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Completing our 2019 IT Predictions Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4fVAAQ]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for completing our 2019 Predictions Survey, your insight is greatly appreciated! As a reward for your time, your £5 Amazon gift card is enclosed below. Turbonomic's Workload Automation solution for hybrid cloud enables our 2000+ customers to reduce the cost, risk, and complexity associated with consolidation and migration. Our agnostic platform provides ongoing optimisation both on-premises and once are in the cloud to ensure you're only paying for what you consume. To learn more, attend our How to Optimise Your VMware ELA Webinar on Wednesday, December 19th at 11 A.M. ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4fVAAQ]]>. Register now to enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. Regards, Megan
{{my.Gift 5:default=edit me}}
